page.title: 16The Brenchley Policeman.
page.content: At{5.45am}he went to the{Paddock {Wood}Office to get messages.He phoned{ {Headquarters}at{Cranbrook}to let them know his plans.He dealt with a summons non - payment of parking tickets and picked up his warrants.{8am}Breakfast. {9am}On patrol.Car hit a brewery lorry on{Lamberhurst Hill.}No-one was injured. He put out accident signs and directed the traffic.He went to talk to Brenchley{Playgroup -}subject:{"The {Policeman is your friend".}He drove to {Cinderhill Wood}to visit the gipsy site.He went to{Paddock Wood}to check parking.He reported to his{sergeant}at the Office at{1.20pm.}They looked at his mileage book and checked his equipment.He was off duty at{2.15pm.} Then he talked to us.He works an{8 {hour}day.He is required to work{2 {nights}in{28 days,10pm - 6am.
